message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I'm looking for $12000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I can't quite meet you halfway. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10500?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you think about $9800? That's the highest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $10200?
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I can do $9900, but that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really serious about this, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $10500, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal?
